solution.linktext: Locate and claim product keys to activate software downloaded from Visual Studio Online (MSDN)
Required product keys: some products require product keys, which will be displayed on the Subscriber Downloads page—find more information in "Locating and Claiming Product keys"

Problem with Visual Studio Online (MSDN) product key: Make sure that both the software and its related product key is obtained through the Visual Studio Online (MSDN) Subscriber Downloads page to function properly
How to get Microsoft Partner Network Help from the RSC

community.linktext: Get help from the Microsoft Partner Support Community
Read the Partner Technical Services blog
Subscribe to the MPN Partner Support YouTube Channel
Join Microsoft Partner Network on Facebook

submission.title: Submit an issue
submission.description: Submit your questions/issues and an agent will contact you within 24 business hours to discuss your submission.

call.title: Call an agent
call.description: Speak to a Regional Service Center agent by phone.

numbers.numbertitle: 1-800-102-1100 (toll free from Airtel land line and mobile phones)
